item1: General Business Description multi-state diversified regional bank holding company organized under Maryland law 1966 headquartered Columbus, Ohio. Through Bank, committed making people’s lives better, helping businesses thrive, strengthening communities serve, been servicing financial needs customers since 1866. Through subsidiaries, provide full-service commercial consumer deposit, lending, other banking services. These include, but not limited to, payments, mortgage banking, direct indirect consumer financing, investment banking, capital markets, advisory, equipment financing, distribution finance, investment management, trust, brokerage, insurance, other financial products services.
item7: Year Ended December 31, Year Ended December 31, (dollar amounts millions unless otherwise noted) Noninterest expense: Direct personnel costs Other noninterest expense, including corporate allocations Total noninterest expense (Loss) income before income taxes Benefit income taxes Income attributable non-controlling interest Net (loss) income attributable Huntington Number employees (average full-time equivalent) Total average assets Treasury / Other reported net loss $725 million 2024, increase net loss $182 million, compared year-ago period, driven decrease net interest income, partially offset decrease noninterest expense. Net interest income decreased $408 million primarily due higher cost funds impact derivatives. Noninterest expense decreased $205 million primarily due increase corporate allocations. item2: Item 2: Management’s Discussion Analysis Financial Condition Results Operations INTRODUCTION multi-state diversified regional bank holding company organized under Maryland law 1966 headquartered Columbus, Ohio. Through Bank, committed making people’s lives better, helping businesses thrive, strengthening communities serve, been servicing financial needs customers since 1866. Through subsidiaries, provide full-service commercial consumer deposit, lending, other banking financial services. These include, but not limited to, payments, mortgage banking, direct indirect consumer financing, investment banking, capital markets, advisory, equipment financing, distribution finance, investment management, trust, brokerage, insurance, other financial products services.
